Hambei

(八百屋半兵衛) (Yaoya Hanbei)

Authority Control:
February 1982 Program; Kabuki tōjō jinbutsu jiten (Tokyo: Hakusuisha, 2006)

Plays:

The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo (心中宵庚申)
